summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 19th Avenue South, from Dearborn Street to Charles Street; and Charles Street, from 19th Avenue South to Davis Place; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7352, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
